name: Queen size Bed frame
description: Family has 4 children. Youngest son was born with multiple complex medical issues and require full time caregivers. Mom has to quit her job and hence family suffers loss of income, unable to afford queen size bed frame at this moment.

passiton.name: Queen size bed frame
passiton.description: This durable queen-size bed frame is light-weight, and can be easily stowed away/transported. It is also possible to put storage boxes under the bed.

name: Baby Cot

name: Baby Cot
description: Family has 3 preschool children, with father as the sole breadwinner. Mother is currently pregnant with her 4th child and is due to give birth in a month. Financial income is limited as it is dependent on father's, while father also has to take no pay leave occasionally to help with caregiving duties when children fall sick. To prepare for upcoming birth, family needs a baby cot to ensure safe sleeping arrangements for newborn. It will greatly benefit them to save on financial expenses too. If you have any baby cot to bless, do contact me at 8940 7451! Thank you (:

name: TV
description: Our Client has been homeless for one year and only recently got approval from HDB to have a rental flat. They do not have sufficient funds to purchase the above-said items which are necessary for ease of living.

passiton.name: Samsung 32 inches TV
passiton.description: 32 inches TV

name: TV
description:
A 73year old gentleman, after spending some time in the transitional shelter, finally managed to get a public housing rental flat. Even though of age, he is still working. To ease his financial burden, he like to request for a TV for his new 1 room flat,which he sharing with another senior, so that they can get suitable entertainment during their free time.   Appreciate if donor can deliver the item to their unit too.

If this speaks to you, please email their social worker (anntat@newhopecs.org.sg) or whatsapp him at 87952925

Thank you for your kindness.

passiton.name: Samsung 32 inches TV
passiton.description: 32 inches TV

name: Wheelchair
description:
Client is largely wheelchair-bound due to her back issue, chemotherapy treatment and medication tiring her out. As her current wheelchair is no longer usable, it would be a great help for client to receive a workable wheelchair.

As client is obese, it would be great if client could receive a wheelchair with wider seats.
specifications: Larger size for plus size person

name: Wheelchair
description:
Elderly amputee man who lives alone requires mobility device (width cannot be more than 20 inch or 51cm) to ambulate within the house and reduce high fall risk. 

Ideally, a one-arm drive wheelchair would be fantastic. However it requires customisation by local supplier DNR wheels and costs $2.5-3k. If this is however out of your budget, a regular wheelchair would suffice. Thank you!

contact.org: Fei Yue Community Services - Mental Health
contact.name: Josef Woon

passiton.name: Bion iLight Wheelchair L120
passiton.description:

https://bion.sg/products/bion-ilight-wheelchair-l120

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is 48 years old, and she has 4 children who are currently still studying in secondary school and primary school. Client has a medical condition on both of her legs that has caused her to be permanently unfit for work. As client is currently not a senior citizen, it is often difficult for client to obtain assistance for her mobility issues. Due to client’s mobility issue, she has been relying solely on the wheelchair for her daily activities. Client shared that her wheelchair has broken down 2 weeks ago and a wheelchair is a necessity for client’s movement.
